p: Furthermore, we found a significant change in these behavioural measures during Early Adaptation in humans (Fig. 2B,C), with a 15 ms slower reaction time, but an 8 ms shorter reach duration relative to baseline, presumably as the participants sped up the reaches to maintain an overall trial duration within the allowed 0.75 s (F ReactionTime(5,525) = 31,424 , p < 0.0005, F ReachDuration (5,557) = 8964 , p < 0.0005).
